description.value:
Requirement You are under the effect of a meditation spell.

You perform the following as you Sustain your Meditation.

Nothing will stop you from progress. You sprout ethereal wings and cast a fierce wind as you [[/act tumble-through]]{Tumble Through (Acrobatics)} / [[/act tumble-through statistic=recitation]]{Tumble Through (Recitation)}. Creatures you pass through during your movement become @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.conditions.enA7BxAjBb7ns1iF]{Suppressed} for 1 round.
